name: Life is Strange - Episode 1
descr:
[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/319630/extras/Steam_banner_616.png?t=1662395426[/img]
[b]Episode 1 now FREE![/b]

Life is Strange is an award-winning and critically acclaimed episodic adventure game that allows the player to rewind time and affect the past, present and future.  

Follow the story of Max Caulfield, a photography senior who discovers she can rewind time while saving her best friend Chloe Price.
The pair soon find themselves investigating the mysterious disappearance of fellow student Rachel Amber, uncovering a dark side to life in Arcadia Bay. Meanwhile, Max must quickly learn that changing the past can sometimes lead to a devastating future.[h2]Key Features:[/h2]
[list][li]A beautifully written modern adventure game.
[/li][li]Rewind time to change the course of events.
[/li][li]Multiple endings depending on the choices you make.
[/li][li]Striking, hand-painted visuals.
[/li][li]Distinct, licensed indie soundtrack.[/li][/list]
detail:
名称: Life is Strange - Episode 1
类型: 动作, 冒险
开发商: DONTNOD Entertainment, Feral Interactive (Mac), Feral Interactive (Linux)
发行商: Square Enix, Feral interactive (Mac), Feral Interactive (Linux)
系列: Life is Strange
发行日期: 2015 年 1 月 29 日
review: 最近评测: 好评如潮 (745) - 过去 30 天内的 745 篇用户评测中有 96% 为好评。
全部评测: 好评如潮 (165,389) - 此游戏的 165,389 篇用户评测中有 96% 为好评。
全部评测: 好评如潮 (165,389 篇中的 96%) 发布至今
最近评测: 好评如潮 (745 篇中的 96%) 最近
sysreq:
Windows
最低配置:
操作系统 *: Windows Vista
处理器: Dual Core 2.0GHz or equivalent
内存: 2 GB RAM
显卡: ATI or NVidia card w/ 512 MB RAM (not recommended for Intel HD Graphics cards)
DirectX 版本: 9.0
存储空间: 需要 5 GB 可用空间
推荐配置:
操作系统 *: Windows 7
处理器: Dual Core 3.0GHz or equivalent
内存: 2 GB RAM
显卡: ATI or NVidia card w/ 1024 MB RAM (NVIDIA GeForce GTX 260 or ATI HD 4890)
DirectX 版本: 9.0
存储空间: 需要 14 GB 可用空间
*
2024 年 1 月 1 日（PT）起，Steam 客户端将仅支持 Windows 10 及更新版本。

Mac OS X
最低配置:
操作系统: macOS 10.11
处理器: 1.8GHz Intel or greater
内存: 4 GB RAM
显卡: 512Mb AMD 4850, 512Mb Nvidia GT130, Intel HD4000 (See Notes for more details)
存储空间: 需要 15 GB 可用空间
附注事项: The game is supported on the following Macs. To check your Mac model and when it was released, select About This Mac from the Apple menu on your menu bar.
* All MacBook Airs released since Mid 2012 (1)
* All 13” MacBook Pros released since Mid 2012 (1)
* All 15” & 17" MacBook Pros released since Mid 2010 with a 512Mb graphics card or better
* All Mac Minis released since Late 2012 (1)
* All iMacs released since Early 2009 with a 512Mb graphics card or better
* All Mac Pros released since early 2009
(1) HD4000 & HD5000 cards require at least 8GB of System Memory
———
The following Macs are capable of running the game but do not consistently meet the standards required for official support.
* All MacBooks released since Early 2016
Please note for your computer to meet the minimum requirements it must match or better all elements of the listed spec. For more detailed specifications check the Feral website.

SteamOS + Linux
最低配置:
操作系统: Ubuntu 16.04 / SteamOS 2.0
处理器: Intel i3 or AMD FX6300
内存: 4 GB RAM
显卡: NVIDIA 640 (1GB), AMD R9 270, Intel Iris Pro 6200 or better
存储空间: 需要 16 GB 可用空间
附注事项: NVIDIA GPU's require Driver version 367.27 (tested). AMD and Intel GPU's require MESA 11.2 (tested). AMD GPUs are not supported on SteamOS
推荐配置:
操作系统: Ubuntu 16.04 / SteamOS 2.0
处理器: Intel Core i5 or better
内存: 8 GB RAM
显卡: NVIDIA 7xx series or better
存储空间: 需要 16 GB 可用空间
附注事项: NVIDIA GPU's require Driver version 367.27 (tested). AMD and Intel GPU's require MESA 11.2 (tested). AMD GPUs are not supported on SteamOS
